heading: 7 Days Leh Ladakh | With Tso Moriri

itinerary.day1Heading: Arrival in Leh | Welcome to the Top of the World
itinerary.day1Overview: After landing in Leh, get welcomed by a representative who will assist in a smooth transfer to the hotel. Complete the check-in formalities and spend a relaxing day getting proper rest. Enjoy a hearty breakfast and gradually acclimatize to the climate. Given the high elevation of Ladakh and the risk of altitude sickness, the whole day will be at leisure. In the evening, enjoy a lip-smacking dinner. Overnight stay at the hotel in Leh.

itinerary.day2Heading: Leh to Sham Valley | Exploring Borders of Leh
itinerary.day2Overview: Wake up to a beautiful morning in the mountains and have a hearty breakfast. Get ready for an adventurous drive to 'Sham Valley', nestled around the Srinagar - Leh highway. Start off the sightseeing by paying homage to the martyrs of the Indo-Pak War at the Hall of Fame. Visit Spituk Gompa, Gurudwara Pathar Sahib, Magnetic Hill, and Indus Sangam Viewpoint. Explore SECMOL, the real 3-idiots school. Return to the hotel for dinner and overnight stay in Leh.

itinerary.day3Heading: Leh to Nubra Valley via Khardung-La Pass | A Drive to the Worldâ€™s Highest Motorable Road (18000 ft.)
itinerary.day3Overview: After a healthy breakfast, embark on the ultimate adventure to Khardung La Pass, one of the highest motorable roads in the world. Take a stopover at the cafe on Khardung-La Pass and soak in the views. Descend from Khardung-la to enter Nubra Valley, known for its sand dunes. Visit Diskit Monastery and enjoy a Bactrian Camel Ride. Later, camp with a bonfire under the starlit sky. Overnight stay in Nubra Valley.

itinerary.day4Heading: Nubra Valley to Pangong Lake | Recreate the Famous Bollywood Moments
itinerary.day4Overview: Wake up to a scrumptious breakfast in Nubra Valley. Get ready to visit Pangong Lake on the Indo-China border. Enjoy exploring the surroundings and recreating Bollywood moments. Stop at Chang-la Pass and visit Druk Padma School, Thiksey Monastery, and Shey Palace en-route. Overnight stay and dinner at a campsite near Pangong Lake.

itinerary.day5Heading: Pangong Lake to Tso Moriri | A Hidden Gem in the Cold Desert
itinerary.day5Overview: Wake up to the beautiful view of Pangong Lake and have breakfast. Journey from Pangong Lake to Tso Moriri offers scenic landscapes. Pass through Tsaga La Pass and Mahe Bridge to reach Tso Moriri. Enjoy the changing hues of the lake and a dinner around the bonfire. Overnight stay at a campsite near Tso Moriri lake.

itinerary.day6Heading: Tso Moriri to Leh | Natural Hot Water Springs of Chumathang
itinerary.day6Overview: After breakfast, head back to Leh passing through picturesque landscapes. Experience a unique bathing adventure at Chumathang Hot Water Spring. Stop at traditional attractions and reach Leh. Visit Leh market for shopping and Ladakhi cuisine. Overnight stay at hotel in Leh.

itinerary.day7Heading: Departure | It's Time to Say Goodbye to the Mountains
itinerary.day7Overview: Complete check-out formalities after breakfast. Transfer to the airport for your onwards journey. Fly out of Leh bidding goodbye to this magical land and fellow travelers.
